```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# a
# RStan model code
stan_code <- "
data {
  int<lower=0> N; // number of observations
  real Y[N]; // observed values
}
parameters {
  real mu; // mean parameter
}
model {
  mu ~ normal(10, 1.2); // prior
  for (n in 1:N)
    Y[n] ~ normal(mu, 1.3); // likelihood
}
"

# Prepare data
data <- list(N = 4, Y = c(7.1, 8.9, 8.4, 8.6))

# Fit model
fit <- stan(model_code = stan_code, data = data, 
            chains = 4, iter = 10000, warmup = 2000, thin = 1)
```


```{r}
# b 
# Trace plots
traceplot(fit, pars = "mu")

# Density plot
stan_dens(fit, pars = "mu", separate_chains = TRUE)

plot_normal(10, 1.2^2)
```
